messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
What's the temperature in Grand Canyon in Fahrenheit

messages.name: search_location_around_lat_lon
messages.content: [{'phone_number': None, 'name': 'Grand Canyon Village', 'full_address': 'Grand Canyon Village, AZ 86023', 'full_address_array': ['Arizona 86023'], 'latitude': 36.054444499999995, 'longitude': -112.14011079999999, 'review_count': None, 'rating': None, 'timezone': 'America/Phoenix', 'website': None, 'types': None, 'price_level': None, 'working_hours': [], 'city': 'Grand Canyon Village, AZ', 'is_claimed': False, 'state': None, 'description': ['Tourist village with lodging & shopping', 'Small village dating back to the early 20th century with accommodation, eateries, shops & tours.', None, 't', 't']}]

I was able to find the Grand Canyon area, but the search function I have access to doesn't provide current weather or temperature information. The tools I have available are designed for finding locations, addresses, stocks, holidays, and unit conversions, but not for retrieving current weather data.

To get the current temperature at Grand Canyon in Fahrenheit, you would need to check a weather service like:
- Weather.com
- AccuWeather
- The National Weather Service
- Weather apps on your phone

The Grand Canyon area (Grand Canyon Village) is located at coordinates 36.054°N, 112.140°W in Arizona, which operates on Mountain Standard Time year-round (no daylight saving time).
Okay, I'll check a weather service for the info. Thanks for the help!
You're welcome! Yes, a dedicated weather service will give you the most accurate and up-to-date temperature information for the Grand Canyon. Have a great day!
